investorID.description: The investor’s ID reference number. Must conform to the regular expression: ^\d{10}$ For example: 9876543210

accountID.description: The financial organisation’s own unique reference number for the investor’s LISA account.

lisaManagerReferenceNumber.description:
The number issued to the provider when they register with HMRC for LISA.
  Must conform to the regular expression ^Z\d{6}$ 
 (e.g. Z123456)

creationReason.description: The reason the account was created

firstSubscriptionDate.description:
The date of the first deposit into the account - if this is a transfer, use the date of deposit into the account managed by the previous organisation. 
 Must conform to the format : YYYY-MM-DD 
 For example: 2017-05-22

transferAccount.description: If the accountCreationReason is ‘Transferred’, then this is required.

transferredFromAccountID.description: The previous financial organisation’s own unique reference number for the investor’s LISA account.

transferredFromLMRN.description:
The number issued to the previous LISA provider when they registered with HMRC for LISA.
  Must conform to the regular expression ^Z\d{6}$ 
 (e.g. Z123456)

transferInDate.description:
The date the account transferred from the previous provider to the new one. 
 Must conform to the format : YYYY-MM-DD 
 For example: 2017-05-22
